overview:
Sherman Dickman is Co-Founder of Postbox, Inc., a new email client built on the Mozilla platform.

Previously Director of Product Management at Mozilla Corporation, Sherman oversaw market and customer research, analytics and metrics. Sherman joined the Mozilla team from Sun Microsystems, Inc. where he spent seven years in product management and strategic marketing roles within the Java Software and Java Web Services Divisions. Prior to Sun, Sherman held product and program management roles at Broderbund, Inc. and Apple.

Sherman holds a B.A. in English from UCLA.
